name: Remedies cumulative
text:
§576B-104  Remedies cumulative.  (a)  Remedies provided by this chapter are cumulative and do not affect the availability of remedies under other law or the recognition of a foreign support order on the basis of comity.
     (b)  This chapter does not:
     (1)  Provide the exclusive method of establishing or enforcing a support order under the law of this State; or
     (2)  Grant a tribunal of this State jurisdiction to render judgment or issue an order relating to child custody or visitation in a proceeding under this chapter.  [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1; ren and am L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
 
Note
 
  Section was former §576B-103.
